about_the_game:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 6


This product depicts 56 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Cultists both male and female, Orcs both male and female, Ancient Black Dragon, Naga both male and female, Bullfrog Men, Lizardfolk, Giant Frogs, Giant Lizards, Crocodiles, Cultist Leader, Bullfrog Men Leader, Gargoyles, both intact and broken, Giant Centipede, Guard Drakes, Wil-o-wips, Specters and a Otyugh.

This Token Pack includes:

  • 2 Ancient Black Dragons
  • 2 Bullfrog Men
  • Bullfrog Man Leader
  • 4 Crocodiles
  • Cultist Female Orc
  • Cultist Leader
  • Male Cultist Orc
  • 2 Dragonclaws
  • 2 Dragonwings
  • Female Cultist
  • 4 Gargoyles
  • Giant Centipede
  • 2 Giant Frogs
  • 2 Giant Lizards
  • 4 Giant Spiders
  • 2 Grey Ooozes
  • 2 Guard Drakes
  • 2 Lizardfolk
  • 2 Lizardfolk Leaders
  • Otyugh
  • Red Wizard Casting
  • Shambling Mound
  • 3 Will-0-Wisps
  • Yuan Ti Abomination
  • 3 Yuan Ti malisons
  • Yuan Ti Pureblood

Conversion by: James Holloway

Released on April 06, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
